label: Data Completeness
description: Indicates how complete the dataset is (e.g., Complete, Low).

label: Data Completeness
description: Indicates how complete the dataset is (e.g., Complete, Low).

label: Data Currency
description: Reflects how current the dataset is (Up-to-date, Slightly Outdated, Outdated).

label: Bias Potential
description: Degree to which the data might contain systematic bias (Low, Medium, High).

label: Prediction Confidence
description: Confidence level associated with any predictive elements (High, Moderate, Low).

label: Visual Complexity
description: Level of visual complexity or interpretive difficulty (Simple, Moderate, Complex).

label: Provenance Transparency
description: Indicates how much detail is provided about data/analysis provenance.

label: Uncertainty Communication
description: Indicates how thoroughly uncertainty is displayed (Low, Medium, High).

label: Dataset Size
description: Indicates the datasetâ€™s relative size (Small, Medium, Large).

label: Indistinguishable Colors
description: Indicates which colors may be hard to distinguish (e.g., Red-Green).

label: LLM Involvement
description: Indicates the level or manner in which an LLM was used (e.g., GPT4, None).

label: Topic Sensitivity
description: Indicates how sensitive or controversial the topic is (Low, Medium, High).
